title: The Alliance
description:
Wendi Nix, Harry Lyles Jr., and Desmond Howard go over the alliance between the Big 10, Pac 12, and ACC, discuss the press conference given by the commissioners, and preview Week 0 of the 2021 College Football season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew discusses the alliance between the Big 10, Pac 12, and ACC.
